Episodes.Title: The Belchies
Episodes.Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Jon Schroeder
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The kids hunt for treasure in an abandoned taffy factory and Bob and Linda must find them before the factory's scheduled demolition.

Episodes.Title: Bob Day Afternoon
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Dan Fybel
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: A bank robber holds up a bank across the street from Bob's Burgers. When the robbery goes awry, Bob finds himself at the center of a hostage crisis.

Episodes.Title: Synchronized Swimming
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The Belcher children sign up for an independent study of synchronized swimming in lieu on participating in gym class. Linda disturbingly watches "pregnant yoga" and comes to the rescue of her children in the end.

Episodes.Title: Burgerboss
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Scott Jacobson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman

Episodes.Title: Food Truckin'
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lizzie Molyneux-Logelin
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob gives the food truck business a try.

Episodes.Title: Dr. Yap
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: When a drugged Bob kisses Gayle thinking she's Linda, Gayle develops a crush on him.

Episodes.Title: Moody Foodie
Episodes.Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: After a critic leaves the restaurant a bad review, Bob goes to drastic measures to get him to change his mind.

Episodes.Title: Bad Tina
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina pals around with a bad girl.

Episodes.Title: Beefsquatch
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Nora Smith
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob gets thrilled when he gets offered to be in a cookery segment in a local morning show. When Gene steps into the limelight, the audience is not entertained and enthralled by Bob's performance.
